Having issues, game runs fine but all text except the "are you sure you want to exit game" box are illegible, looks like braille or something. Just a bunch of dots, any help appreciated.

If you are having the issue with not being able to read anything, go to the games settings (second from the bottom) and click the second tab at the top, then click right below that on the first little scroll down box, and take the first option, then click the far left option that pops up, If you change the games settings below high it will happen again and sometimes crash so just leave the settings at high and fullscreen.
